title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 84 - Attendance Rules For Hospital Teachers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 84 - Attendance Rules For Hospital Teachers

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 84.1 to 84.5)

Attendance (§ 84.10 to 84.13)

Absence with Pay (§ 84.15 to 84.25)

Leaves Without Pay (§ 84.30 to 84.32)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 84

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §452; Civil Service

Law, §136

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
